mapper.select: /* 대국민포털 회원가입용 약관법령 목록 조회 (TrmsSttPVO.selectTrmsListForSignUp) */ SELECT trim(A.trms_stt_cd) trms_stt_cd ,A.up_task_cd ,A.task_cd_nm ,A.trms_stt_aplcn_day ,A.trms_stt_end_day ,A.trms_stt_cn FROM( SELECT ts.trms_stt_cd ,tc.up_task_cd ,tc.task_cd_nm ,ts.trms_stt_aplcn_day ,ts.trms_stt_end_day ,ts.trms_stt_cn ,ROW_NUMBER() over(partition by tc.task_cd order by ts.trms_stt_aplcn_day desc) as rownum FROM "TB_PP_M_TASK_CD" tc INNER JOIN "TB_PP_M_TRMS_STT" ts ON ts.trms_stt_cd = tc.task_cd WHERE 1=1 AND '' != trim(ts.trms_stt_cn) AND tc.task_cd IN('UTZTN', 'STT_PRVC', 'CLCT', 'STTY_AGT') AND to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd') between ts.trms_stt_aplcn_day AND ts.trms_stt_end_day AND tc.use_yn = 'Y' ) A WHERE A.rownum = 1

/* 대국민포털_약관법령 목록 조회 (TrmsSttPVO.selectTrmsSttList) */ SELECT trms_stt_aplcn_day, trms_stt_end_day, trms_stt_cn, atch_file_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_TRMS_STT" WHERE 1=1 AND trms_stt_cd = #{trmsSttCd}

/* 대국민포털_약관법령 최신글 단건 조회 (TrmsSttMapper.getTrmsSttLatest) */ SELECT trms_stt_aplcn_day, trms_stt_end_day, trms_stt_cn, atch_file_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_TRMS_STT" WHERE 1=1 AND trms_stt_cd = #{trmsSttCd} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC LIMIT 1;
